I think these recruiters must have gone to the same recruiter school

03 Apr 2012

## Email 1:

Hi Jessie,

We're a unique executive search firm in that all our partners have
built and run businesses in their own right.

I'm reaching out to you on a funded, pre IPO opportunity in the
enterprise application space based in San Francisco that you may be
interested in. Prime SF location.

Reporting directly to the CMO, we are looking for someone to take the
lead of marketing operations activities and the larger inbound
marketing strategy for the company. It's a vibrant, well-funded
opportunity. The SaaS based service is up, running and generating
revenue. This is a high profile company with a lot of attention
focused on it.

I'd welcome the opportunity to speak with you further about the role
and the company if this could be of interest to you.

Cheers,

## Email 2:

Hi Jessie,

I’m working with a V.C. backed, start-up with an office in San Mateo
that provides cloud-based (SaaS) solutions focusing on mobility and
B2B networking. It’s already a profitable company that has built an
impressive list of clients.

We are looking to add a highly motivated and talented Product Manager
to their team. I came across your profile and was impressed with your
background. The role is both challenging and rewarding and the company
is looking to grow.

Please let me know your availability for a call and I’d be happy to
send over additional information on the company after we speak.

All the best,
